column1: Local Foods////Each sandwich also comes with your choice of 2 sides or a soup. The quinoa was much less quinoa and more butternut squash. Cabbage slaw was all right
column2: but my favorite was definitely the kale. Yummy. The lemongrass soup is basically a traditional Thai Tom Kha Chicken soup. Sweeter than I expected
column3: but still has the wonderfully complex flavors of a Tom Kha--sour
